name: Charles Darwin
what_did:
Darwin studied plants, animals, and fossils around the world.
He came up with the idea of evolution — that living things change over time to better fit their environments.
He wrote a famous book called *On the Origin of Species*.
why_matters:
Darwin changed how people understand nature and life.
His idea of evolution helped explain the variety of life on Earth.
His work is a key part of modern science.

questions.q: What idea is Darwin known for?

fun_fact: Darwin’s journey on the ship *Beagle* lasted almost 5 years — he was only in his 20s!
